rules.description: 9.1.2 If#7 (bottom panel) is equal to or less than 2'-6 & equal to or greater than 1'-6",
9.1.4 If #7 (bottom panel) is less than 9" - no air seal
9.2.2 If#32 (bottom panel) is equal to or less than 2'-6 & equal to or greater than 1'-6",
9.2.3 If#32 (bottom panel) is less than 1-'6" & equal to or greater than 9", use mark 3.
9.3.2 If#8 (bottom panel) is equal to or less than 2'-6 & equal to or greater than 1'-6",
9.3.3 If#8 (bottom panel) is less than 1-'6" & equal to or greater than 6", use mark 6.
